sqlMap.select:
SELECT ZZJG.JGBM dm,
ZZJG.JGBM || ' ' || ZZJG.JC mc
ZZJG.JC mc
FROM (SELECT JG.JGBM,JG.MC,JG.JC,JG.JBDM FROM QY_ZZJG JG,QY_ZZJG DM WHERE JG.JGLB_DM IN (1,2) AND JG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JG.QYBZ = 'Y' AND JG.JBDM LIKE DM.JBDM || '%'
AND JG.JGBM <> #ssGsbm#
AND DM.JGBM = #zgsJgbm# ) ZZJG ORDER BY ZZJG.JBDM

SELECT ZZJG.JGBM dm,
ZZJG.JGBM || ' ' || ZZJG.JC mc
ZZJG.JC mc
FROM (SELECT JG.JGBM,JG.MC,JG.JC,JG.JBDM FROM QY_ZZJG JG,QY_ZZJG DM WHERE JG.JGLB_DM IN (1,2) AND JG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JG.QYBZ = 'Y' AND JG.JBDM LIKE DM.JBDM || '%'
AND JG.JGBM <> #ssGsbm#
AND DM.JGBM = #zgsJgbm# ) ZZJG UNION ALL SELECT F.FBS_DJXH DM,F.FBSJC MC FROM QY_FBS_DJXX F WHERE F.SS_JGBM = #ssGsbm#

SELECT JG.JGBM dm,
JG.JGBM || ' ' || JG.JC mc
JG.JC mc
FROM QY_ZZJG JG WHERE JG.JGLB_DM IN (1,2) AND JG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JG.QYBZ = 'Y' AND JG.JGBM = #gsbm# ORDER BY JG.JBDM

SELECT A.JGBM dm,
A.JGBM || ' ' || A.JC mc
A.JC mc
FROM QY_ZZJG A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.QYBZ = 'Y' AND (A.JGLB_DM = '1' OR A.JGLB_DM = '2') AND (A.SJ_JGBM = #ssGsbm# OR A.JGBM = #ssGsbm#) ORDER BY A.JGBM ASC

SELECT ZZJG.JGBM dm,
ZZJG.JGBM || ' ' || ZZJG.JC mc
ZZJG.JC mc
FROM (SELECT JG.JGBM,JG.MC,JG.JC,JG.JBDM FROM QY_ZZJG JG,QY_ZZJG DM WHERE JG.JGLB_DM IN (1,2) AND JG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JG.QYBZ = 'Y' AND JG.JBDM LIKE DM.JBDM || '%' AND DM.JGBM = #qxJgbm# ) ZZJG ORDER BY ZZJG.JBDM

SELECT A.JGBM dm, NVL(A.SJ_JGBM, 0) parDm, (CASE WHEN A.JGLB_DM = '1' OR A.JGLB_DM = '2' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) openFlag,
A.JGBM || ' ' || LPAD(' ', 2*(level-1), ' ') || A.JC mc
LPAD(' ', 2*(level-1), ' ') || A.JC mc
FROM (SELECT JG.* FROM QY_ZZJG JG WHERE JG.JBDM LIKE (SELECT QX.JBDM FROM QY_ZZJG QX WHERE QX.JGBM = #qxJgbm#) || '%' AND JG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JG.QYBZ = 'Y' ) A START WITH A.JGBM = #qxJgbm# CONNECT BY PRIOR JGBM = A.SJ_JGBM

SELECT JG.JGBM dm,
JG.JGBM || ' ' || JG.JC mc
JG.JC mc
FROM QY_ZZJG JG WHERE JG.JGLB_DM = 4 AND JG.Sj_Jgbm = #sjJgbm# AND JG.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JG.QYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY JG.JBDM

SELECT GW.GW_DJXH dm,
GW.GW_DJXH || ' ' || GW.GW_JC mc
GW.GW_JC mc
FROM QY_GW GW WHERE GW.SS_JGBM = #bmdm# AND GW.QYBZ = 'Y' AND GW.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY GW.GW_MC
SELECT A.JGLB_DM DM, A.JGLB_DM || ' ' || A.JGLB_MC MC FROM DM_JGLB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.JGLB_DM
SELECT A.GW_DM DM, A.GW_DM || ' ' || A.GW_MC MC FROM DM_GW A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.GW_DM
SELECT A.JS_DM DM, A.JS_DM || ' ' || A.JS_MC MC FROM DM_JS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.JS_DM
SELECT A.RYLB_DM DM, A.RYLB_DM || ' ' || A.RYLB_MC MC FROM DM_RYLB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.RYLB_DM
SELECT A.XTYHFL_DM DM, A.XTYHFL_DM || ' ' || A.XTYHFL_MC MC FROM DM_XTYHFL A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.XTYHFL_DM
SELECT A.DLYZFS_DM DM, A.DLYZFS_DM || ' ' || A.DLYZFS_MC MC FROM DM_DLYZFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DLYZFS_DM
SELECT A.SJXLB_DM DM, A.SJXLB_DM || ' ' || A.SJXLB_MC MC FROM DM_SJXLB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.XYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SJXLB_DM
SELECT A.CSLB_DM DM, A.CSLB_DM || ' ' || A.CSLB_MC MC FROM DM_CSLB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CSLB_DM
SELECT A.XZXM_DM DM, A.XZXM_DM || ' ' || A.XZXM_VALUE_MC MC FROM DM_XZXM A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.XYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.XZXM_DM
SELECT A.XZQHJB_DM DM, A.XZQHJB_DM || ' ' || A.XZQHJB_MC MC FROM DM_XZQHJB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.XZQHJB_DM
SELECT A.XZQH_DM DM, A.XZQH_DM || ' ' || A.XZQH_MC MC FROM DM_XZQH A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.XZQH_DM
SELECT A.ZJLX_DM DM, A.ZJLX_DM || ' ' || A.ZJLX_MC mc FROM DM_ZJLX A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ZJLX_DM
SELECT A.HWZT_DM DM, A.HWZT_DM || ' ' || A.HWZT_MC MC FROM DM_HWZT A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.HWZT_DM
SELECT A.CLSX_DM DM, A.CLSX_DM || ' ' || A.CLSX_MC MC FROM DM_CLSX A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CLSX_DM
SELECT A.PCFS_DM DM, A.PCFS_DM || ' ' || A.PCFS_MC MC FROM DM_PCFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PCFS_DM
SELECT A.YSFS_DM DM, A.YSFS_DM || ' ' || A.YSFS_MC MC FROM DM_YSFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.YSFS_DM
SELECT A.ZCFS_DM DM, A.ZCFS_DM || ' ' || A.ZCFS_MC MC FROM DM_ZCFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ZCFS_DM
SELECT A.AJJG_DM DM, A.AJJG_DM || ' ' || A.AJJG_MC MC FROM DM_AJJG A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.AJJG_DM
SELECT A.HWFL_DM DM, A.HWFL_DM || ' ' || A.HWFL_MC MC FROM DM_HWFL A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.HWFL_DM
SELECT A.THFL_DM DM, A.THFL_DM || ' ' || A.THFL_MC MC FROM DM_THFL A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.THFL_DM
SELECT A.ZRBM_DM DM, A.ZRBM_DM || ' ' || A.ZRBM_MC MC FROM DM_ZRBM A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ZRBM_DM
SELECT A.YFJSF_DM DM, A.YFJSF_DM || ' ' || A.YFJSF_MC MC FROM DM_YFJSF A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.YFJSF_DM
SELECT A.XXGXFS_DM DM, A.XXGXFS_DM || ' ' || A.XXGXFS_MC MC FROM DM_XXGXFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.XXGXFS_DM

SELECT A.JLDW_DM DM,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC MC
A.JLDW_JC MC
FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND B.Dj_Jgbm = ( SELECT DJ_JGBM FROM ( SELECT DJ_JGBM,C.JGLB_DM, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*),B.DJ_JGBM FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='01' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND B.Dj_Jgbm IN ( SELECT JG.JGBM FROM QY_ZZJG JG, QY_ZZJG BM WHERE BM.JBDM LIKE JG.JBDM || '%' AND BM.JGBM = #bmbm# ) GROUP BY B.DJ_JGBM )D, QY_ZZJG C WHERE C.JGBM = D.DJ_JGBM ORDER BY JGLB_DM DESC ) WHERE RN = 1 ) AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='01' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' ORDER BY A.JLDW_DM

SELECT A.JLDW_DM DM, B.jbdwbz defaultFlag,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC MC
A.JLDW_JC MC
FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND B.Dj_Jgbm = ( SELECT DJ_JGBM FROM ( SELECT DJ_JGBM,C.JGLB_DM, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*),B.DJ_JGBM FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='02' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND B.Dj_Jgbm IN ( SELECT JG.JGBM FROM QY_ZZJG JG, QY_ZZJG BM WHERE BM.JBDM LIKE JG.JBDM || '%' AND BM.JGBM = #bmbm# ) GROUP BY B.DJ_JGBM )D, QY_ZZJG C WHERE C.JGBM = D.DJ_JGBM ORDER BY JGLB_DM DESC ) WHERE RN = 1 ) AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='02' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' ORDER BY A.JLDW_DM

SELECT A.JLDW_DM DM,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC MC
A.JLDW_JC MC
FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND B.Dj_Jgbm = ( SELECT DJ_JGBM FROM ( SELECT DJ_JGBM,C.JGLB_DM, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*),B.DJ_JGBM FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='03' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND B.Dj_Jgbm IN ( SELECT JG.JGBM FROM QY_ZZJG JG, QY_ZZJG BM WHERE BM.JBDM LIKE JG.JBDM || '%' AND BM.JGBM = #bmbm# ) GROUP BY B.DJ_JGBM )D, QY_ZZJG C WHERE C.JGBM = D.DJ_JGBM ORDER BY JGLB_DM DESC ) WHERE RN = 1 ) AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='03' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' ORDER BY A.JLDW_DM

SELECT A.JLDW_DM DM,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC MC
A.JLDW_JC MC
FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND B.Dj_Jgbm = ( SELECT DJ_JGBM FROM ( SELECT DJ_JGBM,C.JGLB_DM, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*),B.DJ_JGBM FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='04' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND B.Dj_Jgbm IN ( SELECT JG.JGBM FROM QY_ZZJG JG, QY_ZZJG BM WHERE BM.JBDM LIKE JG.JBDM || '%' AND BM.JGBM = #bmbm# ) GROUP BY B.DJ_JGBM )D, QY_ZZJG C WHERE C.JGBM = D.DJ_JGBM ORDER BY JGLB_DM DESC ) WHERE RN = 1 ) AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='04' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' ORDER BY A.JLDW_DM

SELECT A.JLDW_DM DM,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC MC
A.JLDW_JC MC
FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND B.Dj_Jgbm = ( SELECT DJ_JGBM FROM ( SELECT DJ_JGBM,C.JGLB_DM, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*),B.DJ_JGBM FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='07' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND B.Dj_Jgbm IN ( SELECT JG.JGBM FROM QY_ZZJG JG, QY_ZZJG BM WHERE BM.JBDM LIKE JG.JBDM || '%' AND BM.JGBM = #bmbm# ) GROUP BY B.DJ_JGBM )D, QY_ZZJG C WHERE C.JGBM = D.DJ_JGBM ORDER BY JGLB_DM DESC ) WHERE RN = 1 ) AND A.JLDW_FL_DM='07' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' ORDER BY A.JLDW_DM

SELECT A.JLDW_DM DM,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC MC
A.JLDW_JC MC
FROM DM_JLDW A, QY_JCBM_JLDW B WHERE A.JLDW_DM=B.JLDW_DM AND B.SS_JGBM=#ssJgbm# AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND B.QYBZ='Y' AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND A.JLDW_DM LIKE '05%' ORDER BY A.JLDW_DM

SELECT A.FBS_DJXH dm,
A.FBS_DJXH || ' ' || A.FBSJC mc
A.FBSJC mc
FROM QY_FBS_DJXX A WHERE A.SS_JGBM = #sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.QYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY mc asc

SELECT A.KH_DJXH dm,
A.KH_DJXH || ' ' || A.KHJC mc
A.KHJC mc
FROM QY_KH_DJXX A WHERE A.SS_JGBM = #sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.QYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY mc asc

SELECT A.HW_DJXH dm,
A.HW_DJXH || ' ' || A.HWJC mc
A.HWJC mc
FROM QY_KH_HWXX A WHERE A.KH_DJXH = #sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.QYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY mc asc

SELECT AA.CZY_DJXH dm,
AA.CZY_DJXH || ' ' || AA.MC mc
AA.MC mc
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.CZY_DJXH, A.MC FROM QY_RYDJ A, QY_RY_GW B WHERE A.CZY_DJXH=B.CZY_DJXH AND B.SS_JGBM = #sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.QYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MC ASC ) AA

SELECT A.LX_DJXH dm,
A.LX_DJXH || ' ' || A.LXJC mc
A.LXJC mc
FROM QY_FBS_LXDJ A WHERE A.FBS_DJXH = #sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.QYBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY mc asc

SELECT A.JLDW_FL_DM dm,
A.JLDW_FL_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_FL_MC mc
A.JLDW_FL_MC mc
FROM DM_JLDW_FL A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY mc asc

SELECT A.WLRY_FLXH dm,
A.WLRY_FLXH || ' ' || A.FLMC mc
A.FLMC mc
FROM BG_WLRY_FL A WHERE A.JGBM=#sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT A.DLFS_DM dm,
A.DLFS_DM || ' ' || A.DLFS_MC mc
A.DLFS_MC mc
FROM DM_DLFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT A.YWFL_DM dm,
A.YWFL_DM || ' ' || A.YWFL_MC mc
A.YWFL_MC mc
FROM DM_YWFL A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT A.YWHJ_DM dm,
A.YWHJ_DM || ' ' || A.YWHJ_MC mc
A.YWHJ_MC mc
FROM DM_YWHJ A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.YWFL_DM = #sj#

SELECT A.WS_DM dm,
A.WS_DM || ' ' || A.WS_MC mc
A.WS_MC mc
FROM DM_WS A, QY_SPWS B WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND B.YXBZ='Y' AND A.WS_DM=B.WS_DM AND B.JGBM=#jgbm# AND A.Xmflbz='Y'

SELECT A.WSSPMS_DM dm,
A.WSSPMS_DM || ' ' || A.WSSPMS_MC mc
A.WSSPMS_MC mc
FROM Dm_Wsspms A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT WSXM.XMFL_DJXH dm,
WSXM.XMFL_DJXH || ' ' || WSXM.XMFLMC mc
WSXM.XMFLMC mc
FROM QY_SPWS_XMFL WSXM,QY_SPWS SPWS WHERE WSXM.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SPWS.YXBZ='Y' AND WSXM.JGBM=SPWS.JGBM AND WSXM.WS_DM=SPWS.WS_DM
AND WSXM.WS_DM = #sj#
SELECT A.CSH_DJXH dm, A.CSH_DJXH || ' ' || A.YHMC || ',' || A.ZH || ',' || A.HM mc FROM CW_HBZC_CSH A WHERE A.ZCFL_DM='12' AND A.SS_JGBM = #sj# AND A.YXBZ='Y' AND A.QYBZ='Y'
SELECT A.SHFS_DM DM, A.SHFS_DM || ' ' || A.SHFS_MC MC FROM DM_SHFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SHFS_DM
SELECT A.YKJSFS_DM DM, A.YKJSFS_DM || ' ' || A.YKJSFS_MC MC FROM DM_YKJSFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.YKJSFS_DM
SELECT A.YJJSFS_DM DM, A.YJJSFS_DM || ' ' || A.YJJSFS_MC MC FROM DM_YJJSFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.YJJSFS_DM

SELECT FBS.FBS_DJXH DM,
FBS.FBS_DJXH || ' ' || FBS.FBSJC mc
FBS.FBSJC mc
FROM QY_FBS_DJXX FBS WHERE FBS.YXBZ = 'Y' AND FBS.SS_JGBM = #ssJgbm#

SELECT A.XXZJ_DJXH AS dm,
A.XXZJ_DJXH || ' ' || A.XXZJJC mc
A.XXZJJC mc
FROM QY_XXZJ_DJXX A WHERE A.YXBZ='Y' and A.SS_JGBM=#ssJgbm# ORDER by xxzjjc
SELECT A.SPJGJB_DM DM, A.SPJGJB_DM || ' ' || A.SPJGJB_MC MC FROM DM_SPJGJB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SPJGJB_DM
SELECT A.DZZT_DM DM, A.DZZT_DM || ' ' || A.DZZT_MC MC FROM DM_DZZT A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DZZT_DM
SELECT A.ZCFL_DM DM, A.ZCFL_DM || ' ' || A.ZCFL_MC MC FROM DM_ZCFL A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ZCFL_DM
SELECT A.DZCYYY_DM DM, A.DZCYYY_DM || ' ' || A.DZCYYY_MC MC FROM DM_DZCYYY A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DZCYYY_DM
SELECT A.DZCY_CLFS_DM DM, A.DZCY_CLFS_DM || ' ' || A.DZCY_CLFS_MC MC FROM DM_DZCY_CLFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DZCY_CLFS_DM
SELECT A.DZCY_CLFS_DM DM, A.DZCY_CLFS_DM || ' ' || A.DZCY_CLFS_MC MC FROM DM_DZCY_CLFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.DZCY_CLFS_DM LIKE '3%' ORDER BY A.DZCY_CLFS_DM
SELECT A.PCFS_DM DM, ' ' || A.PCFS_MC MC FROM DM_PCFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PCFS_DM
SELECT A.DJS_SJLY_DM DM, A.DJS_SJLY_DM || ' ' || A.DJS_SJLY_MC MC FROM DM_DJS_SJLY A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DJS_SJLY_DM

SELECT A.CLXHWH_DJXH DM,
A.CLXHWH_DJXH || ' ' || A.CLXH MC
A.CLXH MC
FROM QY_CLXHWH A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.SS_JGBM = #gsbm# ORDER BY A.CLXHWH_DJXH

SELECT A.JLDW_DM dm,
A.JLDW_DM || ' ' || A.JLDW_JC mc
A.JLDW_JC mc
FROM dm_jldw A WHERE A.JLDW_FL_DM = #sj# AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY mc asc
SELECT A.CSBM_DM DM, A.CSBM_DM || ' ' || A.CSBM_MC MC FROM DM_CSBM A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CSBM_DM

SELECT A.FYLB_DM DM, A.FYLB_DM || ' ' || A.FYLB_MC MC FROM DM_FYLB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y'
A.FYDL_DM = #fydlDm#
ORDER BY A.FYLB_DM
SELECT A.FYCLFS_DM DM, A.FYCLFS_DM || ' ' || A.FYCLFS_MC MC FROM DM_FYCLFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.FYCLFS_DM

SELECT A.HWXH_DJXH DM,
A.HWXH_DJXH || ' ' || A.XHJC mc
A.XHJC mc
FROM QY_KH_HWXH A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.HW_DJXH=#sj# ORDER BY mc asc
SELECT HPH.FHR_DJXH DM, HPH.FHR_DJXH || ' ' || HPH.FHR_MC MC FROM HY_PC_HWXX HPH WHERE HPH.PC_DJXH = #sj#
SELECT A.WLSSCLFS_DM DM, A.WLSSCLFS_DM || ' ' || A.WLSSCLFS_MC MC FROM DM_WLSSCLFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.WLSSCLFS_DM

SELECT A.WH_XH DM,
A.WH_XH DM || ' ' || A.WLSSYY MC
A.WLSSYY MC
from qy_wlssyy A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.SS_JGBM = #zgs# ORDER BY A.WH_XH
SELECT A.WSSPZT_DM DM, A.WSSPZT_DM || ' ' || A.WSSPZT_MC MC FROM DM_WSSPZT A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.WSSPZT_DM
SELECT A.ZFFS_DM DM, A.ZFFS_DM || ' ' || A.ZFFS_MC MC FROM DM_ZFFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.ZFFS_DM

select distinct(QA.czy_djxh) DM,(select mc from qy_rydj qb where qa.czy_djxh = qb.czy_djxh) MC from QY_RY_GW qa, qy_rydj ry where qa.czy_djxh = ry.czy_djxh and ry.yxbz = 'Y' AND RY.QYBZ = 'Y' and exists(select jgbm from QY_ZZJG a,(select jbdm from QY_ZZJG b where b.jgbm = #ssJgbm#) z where qa.ss_jgbm = a.jgbm and a.jbdm like (z.jbdm||'%')) ORDER BY MC
select csh_djxh as dm,yhmc||' '||zh as mc from cw_hbzc_csh where zcfl_dm = 12 and ss_jgbm = #ssJgbm# and yxbz='Y' and qybz='Y' ORDER BY csh_djxh
SELECT A.DZFS_DM DM, A.DZFS_DM || ' ' || A.DZFS_MC MC FROM DM_DZFS A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DZFS_DM
select WH_XH AS DM,FYDJ_XMMC AS MC from qy_fydjxm WHERE (CLSX_DM =#clsxDm# OR CLSX_DM IS NULL) and SS_JGBM =#ssJgbm# and yxbz = 'Y' ORDER BY WH_XH ASC

SELECT A.CW_DJXH DM,
A.CW_DJXH || ' ' || A.FYLB_MC MC
A.FYLB_MC MC
FROM CW_FYLB A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.SS_JGBM=#zgs# ORDER BY A.CW_DJXH

SELECT A.CW_DJXH DM,
A.CW_DJXH || ' ' || A.FYXM_MC MC
A.FYXM_MC MC
FROM cw_fyxm_wh A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.SS_JGBM=#zgs# ORDER BY A.CW_DJXH

SELECT A.CW_DJXH DM, A.FYXM_MC MC,(select XMFLMC from QY_SPWS_XMFL where XMFL_DJXH=A.SPLC_XMFL_DJXH) openFlag FROM cw_fyxm_wh A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' and A.FYLB_CW_DJXH=#sj# AND A.SS_JGBM=#zgs# ORDER BY A.CW_DJXH
SELECT WSFL.XMFL_DJXH DM, WSFL.XMFL_DJXH || ' ' || WSFL.XMFLMC MC FROM QY_SPWS_XMFL WSFL WHERE WSFL.YXBZ = 'Y' AND WSFL.WS_DM = '100002' AND WSFL.JGBM = #zgs#

SELECT A.WH_XH DM,
A.WH_XH || ' ' || A.DZCYYY MC
A.DZCYYY MC
FROM QY_DZCYYY A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DZCYYY

SELECT distinct A.ZCFL_DM DM, (case A.ZCFL_DM when 12 then A.ZCFL_DM || ' ' || A.ZCFL_MC else A.ZCFL_DM || ' ' || A.ZCFL_MC||' '||hb.csh_djxh END) MC FROM DM_ZCFL A,cw_hbzc_csh hb WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' and hb.qybz(+) = 'Y' and a.zcfl_dm = hb.zcfl_dm(+) and hb.ss_jgbm(+) = #ssJgbm# ORDER BY A.ZCFL_DM
SELECT A.DFF_DJXH DM, A.DFF_DJXH || ' ' || A.DFF_MC MC FROM DM_DFF A WHERE A.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.DFF_DJXH

select d.kmxl_dm dm,d.kmxl_dm||' '||d.kmxl_mc mc from dm_kmxl d where d.yxbz='Y'
d.kmdl_dm in (1,3)
d.kmdl_dm in (2,4)
order by d.kmxl_dm asc
select d.ysyfly_dm dm,d.ysyfly_dm||''||d.ysyfly_mc mc from dm_ysyfly d order by d.ysyfly_dm asc
